name: Blackish Habitica
description:
Habitica in very dark gray to black colors. Serves best as a night theme.
Safe for work, cartoonish ribbon on the task page is removed.
Minor changes: improved look of chat messages, removed background from items in shop.

This is highly reworked style 135793. I'm even too lazy to remove his comments from the code.

style_setting_options.label: Darkened (not that good yet)
